sourcesContent:
<template>
<svg width="90" height="60" viewBox="0 0 90 60" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="empty-radar-svg">
  <!-- 外层多边形 -->
  <polygon points="45,12 75,30 65,55 25,55 15,30" fill="#A0C4FF" opacity="0.18" />
  <!-- 动画多边形 -->
  <polygon class="radar-shape" points="45,22 68,34 60,50 30,50 22,34" fill="#4F8EF7" />
  <!-- 端点动画 -->
  <circle class="radar-dot dot1" cx="45" cy="22" r="3" />
  <circle class="radar-dot dot2" cx="68" cy="34" r="3" />
  <circle class="radar-dot dot3" cx="60" cy="50" r="3" />
  <circle class="radar-dot dot4" cx="30" cy="50" r="3" />
  <circle class="radar-dot dot5" cx="22" cy="34" r="3" />
</svg>
</template>

<script setup>
</script>

<style scoped>
.empty-radar-svg {
  display: block;
  margin: 0 auto;
  animation: floatX 3.2s ease-in-out infinite;
}
.radar-shape {
  opacity: 0.85;
  transform-origin: 45px 35px;
  animation: radar-expand 2.2s cubic-bezier(.4,1.6,.6,1) infinite;
}
.radar-dot {
  fill: #FFB300;
  opacity: 0.85;
  transform-origin: center;
  animation: dot-pulse 2.2s cubic-bezier(.4,1.6,.6,1) infinite;
}
.dot1 { animation-delay: 0.0s; }
.dot2 { animation-delay: 0.3s; }
.dot3 { animation-delay: 0.6s; }
.dot4 { animation-delay: 0.9s; }
.dot5 { animation-delay: 1.2s; }
@keyframes radar-expand {
  0% { transform: scale(0.7); opacity: 0.7; }
  20% { transform: scale(1.1); opacity: 1; }
  50% { transform: scale(1.15); opacity: 1; }
  80% { transform: scale(1.1); opacity: 1; }
  100% { transform: scale(0.7); opacity: 0.7; }
}
@keyframes dot-pulse {
  0% { r: 3; opacity: 0.7; }
  20% { r: 5; opacity: 1; }
  50% { r: 6; opacity: 1; }
  80% { r: 5; opacity: 1; }
  100% { r: 3; opacity: 0.7; }
}
@keyframes floatX {
  0% { transform: translateY(0) translateX(0); }
  25% { transform: translateY(-8px) translateX(4px); }
  50% { transform: translateY(-12px) translateX(-4px); }
  75% { transform: translateY(-8px) translateX(4px); }
  100% { transform: translateY(0) translateX(0); }
}
</style>
